Reviews.Title: “4 starts?! not even close!”
Reviews.Author: Sergio V
Reviews.Content: staff nice helpfull breakfast complete hotel dont rating called 4 stars definetly wasnt propper 4 star european tour ive stayed 2 3 amazingly lobby decoration horribly tacky elevators ok clean comfortable courtains windows separating shower rest bathroom sometimes bite messy minibar refrigerator wasnt 1st time day drinks bit warm checked closed finally importantly im guessing hotel placed venezia mestre venezia island walk 5 minutes bus station bus ride 1520 minutes island little worst wasnt easy whenever detail bring review im pretty guy bar cleaned anyways repeat words hotel ok sleeping maybe staying hours bed youre expecting normal 4stars hotel facilities nice details hotel youre looking

Reviews.Title: “Pleasing comfortable and affordable”
Reviews.Author: mikeandMrsMike
Reviews.Content: short stay hotel tour italy found staff extremely polite helpful honest comortable outside venice trip accessable staff explain worth noting restaurants nearby affordable defintely stay recommend breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Great Value - Great Location Just Outside Venice”
Reviews.Author: twocatts
Reviews.Content: hotel outside venice 15 minutes bus takes straight piazza roma chose hotel travelling car secure park easy access venice hotel 1980s decor lots pink grey clean service front desk excellent breakfast buffet style usual eggs bacon cereal cakes fruit yoghurt bus stop venice 2 minutes walk hotel front desk map bus stop worth noting 12 bus easy running day night

HotelInfo.Name: Alexander Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Via Forte Marghera 193c, 30173 Venice, Italy
